p: A total of 53 articles with 64 records and a sample size of 35,007 reported HBV prevalence in PWID and FSWs. A total of 37 papers with 44 records had been conducted on PWID and 18 papers with 20 records on FSWs. The overall prevalence of HBV in PWID and FSWs was 6% (95% CI: 5–8%, p = 0.00, I 2 = 94.84%) and 3% (95% CI: 1–5%, p = 0.00, I 2 = 95.37%), respectively ( Supplementary Figures S5 and S6, Table 2).
